channel.title: 5.15 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建
channel.description: Recent content in 5.15 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建

item.title: 5.15.6 的 Windows 版本
item.description: 备注 ODBC and SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage. All Dynamic builds have -plugin-sql-xxx. 备注 All builds have -schannel which use Windows Secure Channel SSL backend. 备注 All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. 备注 Note: Qt release Qt 5.15 series opensource version a year later than commerical version, while still release QtWebEngine at same time commerical version released.

item.title: 5.15.6 的 macOS 版本
item.description: 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -plugin-sql-sqlite 备注 All builds have -no-openssl -securetransport. It means that we are using Secure Transport library of macOS to provide SSL connections. 备注 All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. 备注 Note: Qt release Qt 5.15 series opensource version a year later than commerical version, while still release QtWebEngine at same time commerical version released.

item.title: 5.15.6 的安卓版本
item.description: 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -plugin-sql-sqlite 备注 All packages have -openssl-linked, Since BoringSSL, which is used in Android 6.0 or later, is NOT API COMPATIBLE WITH OPENSSL, we link it to a static OpenSSL 1.1.1 series instead of system SSL library. 备注 All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users.

item.title: 5.15.6 的 WebAssembly 版本
item.description: 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -plugin-sql-sqlite 备注 All packages have -no-ssl because of compile failure with -ssl -openssl-linked. 备注 All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. 备注 All builds are using emscripten SDK 1.39.8 as recommended in Qt Wiki. All builds are with -feature-threads. 备注 Qt for WebAssembly can’t be built to shared libs.
